message: Let's split fairly, Bob. A slightly better deal for me ensures I'm motivated to play, but you're still getting a great deal.
I think a slightly better deal for me this time will motivate me to accept the offer.  We can split things evenly next round if you'd like.
Bob, let's be real - the inflation is hurting both of us. An even split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take it before it's too late!
